title:
Classification of groups whose common divisor graph on $p$-regular
  classes has no triangles
authors: Mar\'ia Jos\'e Felipe, Marc Kelly Jean-Philippe, V\'ictor Sotomayor
abstract:
Let $p$ be a prime. In this paper we classify the $p$-structure of those
finite $p$-separable groups such that, given any three non-central conjugacy
classes of $p$-regular elements, two of them necessarily have coprime lengths.
